title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.
hints: Think about using a hash map to store numbers you've seen
For each number, check if target - number exists in your hash map

title: Valid Anagram
description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s, and false otherwise.
hints: Count the frequency of each character
Compare the character counts of both strings

title: Contains Duplicate
description: Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice in the array.
hints: Use a set to track numbers you've seen
If you see a number again, return true

title: Group Anagrams
description: Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together.
hints: Anagrams have the same character counts
Use sorted string or character count as a key

title: Top K Frequent Elements
description: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements.
hints: Count frequencies using a hash map
Use bucket sort or a heap to find top k
